login_subtitle: Enter your phone number to get started with smart farming solutions
error_occurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
welcome_message: Your smart farming companion is here to help!
crop_advisory_subtitle: Get expert advice for your crops using text or voice input
wheat_advice: For wheat cultivation: Plant in well-drained soil, maintain proper spacing, use balanced fertilizers, and monitor for rust diseases. Harvest when grains are golden yellow.
rice_advice: For rice farming: Ensure proper water management, use certified seeds, apply nitrogen fertilizers in splits, and control weeds regularly. Monitor for blast and bacterial blight.
pest_advice: For pest control: Use integrated pest management, monitor regularly, apply organic pesticides when needed, maintain field hygiene, and use resistant varieties.
general_advice: For general farming: Test soil regularly, use quality seeds, maintain proper irrigation, apply balanced fertilizers, and follow crop rotation practices.
soil_advisory_subtitle: Upload soil image for detailed analysis and recommendations
soil_image_instruction: Take a clear photo of your soil sample for accurate analysis
tip_1: Test your soil pH regularly - most crops prefer 6.0-7.0 pH
tip_2: Add organic matter like compost to improve soil structure
tip_3: Practice crop rotation to maintain soil fertility
tip_4: Avoid over-tilling which can damage soil structure
tip_5: Use cover crops to prevent soil erosion
image_pick_error: Error picking image. Please try again.
soil_analysis_mock_result:

Soil Type: Loamy

Organic Matter: 3.2%

Recommendations:
• Add phosphorus-rich fertilizer
• Maintain current organic matter levels
• Suitable for wheat, rice, and vegetables
• Consider adding compost for better structure
